[DQC.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 1005006 - Statement - Laskelma oman pääoman muutoksista (Statement) includes the concept ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called ifrs-full:StatementOfChangesInEquityTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis. The statement presentation group 1005006 - Statement - Laskelma oman pääoman muutoksista (Statement) includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table ifrs-full:StatementOfChangesInEquityTable:
ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions = 3,300,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table ifrs-full:StatementOfChangesInEquityTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseThroughSharebasedPaymentTransactions Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis=ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember
